comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: Harden backup error handling - The script uses pg_dump without explicit error handling; if the first dump succeeds but the second fails, it may leave partial artifacts unnoticed. Add set -euo pipefail and a trap to surface failures and exit cleanly, ensuring backups are atomic and reliable.
comments.resolution: Error handling already implemented - script includes set -euo pipefail, error trap with cleanup function, and comprehensive error checking for all pg_dump operations
